H0.text: Increase friction is what makes mountain bike tires with large, knob-like treads useful on steep slopes.

H1.text: Carry heavy weights is why mountain bike tires with large, knob‑like treads are useful on steep slopes.

H2.text: Increasing the stopping distance is why mountain bike tires with large, knob‑like treads are useful on steep slopes.

H3.text: Prevent braking of the bicycle is what mountain bike tires with large, knob‑like treads accomplish, making them useful on steep slopes.
